headline: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Backlog Growth Drives Higher Price View at Bernstein
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is included among 12 Unstoppable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 6, Bernstein raised its price recommendation on L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) to $405 from $398. It maintained an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm pointed to the company’s Q4 results, reported on January 29, which came […]
